name: GRIS
notes: If your gamepad is not detected or you experience any other problem, please check known issues.
content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com installer
- mf_install_verb: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/winetricks/mf_install.verb
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/GRIS/GRIS.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing GRIS
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mf_install_verb
    name: winetricks
system:
  fps_limit: '60'
wine:
  dxvk: true
